description:
Despite Matakara`s protests, Arajin joins Siguma Squad to please Mahoro. Marito takes Arajin out and tells him that they`re headed to a raunchy welcome party full of girls. When they arrive, Arajin discovers that the party is not at all what he imagined.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Love at Fist Fight! The One and Only Quail in the World
Naguri Ai! Sekai ni Hitotsu dake no Uzura
Un échange passionné ! Le seul œuf de caille au monde !
なぐり愛! 世界に一つだけのウズラ
